DOC.brief_summary: This study is to set the place of microsurgery in surgical treatment od varicocele in infertile male. Fourty patients will undergo microsurgical subinguinal varicocelectomy while the control group consisting of 20 patients wil undergo laparoscopic varicocelectomy.
DOC.brief_title: The Role of Microsurgery in Surgical Treatment of Varicocele.
DOC.criteria: clinical varicocele infertility duration of min one year poor semen quality otherwise unexplained infertility in the couple female infertility
